attributes.action: Allow Ukrainian refugees to enter the UK without Visas
attributes.additional_details: Millions of British families would likely welcome refugee families from our ally and European continental neighbour. let them in.
attributes.background: The UK must, like the rest of the world, permit unhindered access to Ukranians fleeing the war. It is an embarrassment to be British that in their hour of need, we would close the door. Help us, help them!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
